                  [77.62019011702867, 12.909980387513192],
                  [77.62040469374986, 12.910921572951292],
                  [77.61894557204576, 12.911862754845362],
                  [77.61718604293199, 12.91307582850295]]]),
            {
              "lc": 1,
              "system:index": "1"
            })]);
            
function maskClouds(image) {
  
  // Bits 3 and 5 are cloud shadow and cloud, respectively.
    var cloudShadowBitMask = ee.Number(2).pow(3).int();
    var cloudsBitMask = ee.Number(2).pow(5).int();  
    
    var qa = image.select('pixel_qa');
    
     // Both flags should be set to zero, indicating clear conditions.
    var mask = qa.bitwiseAnd(cloudShadowBitMask).eq(0)
    .and(qa.bitwiseAnd(cloudsBitMask).eq(0)); 
    
      // Return the masked image, scaled to [0, 1].
  return image.updateMask(mask).divide(10000).copyProperties(image, ["system:time_start"]);
}
      //  ......................indices......................

Map.setCenter(77.52, 12.91, 10)

var indices = function(img) {
  // NDVI
  var ndvi = img.normalizedDifference(['B5','B4']).rename('NDVI');
  var ndbi = img.normalizedDifference(['B6', 'B5']).rename(['ndbi']);
  var ndwi = img.normalizedDifference(['B3', 'B5']);

  return img.addBands(ndvi).addBands(ndbi)

}

       

// ............................................................................

var l8 =ee.ImageCollection("LANDSAT/LC08/C01/T1_SR")
.filterBounds(region)
.filterDate("2014-01-01", "2014-09-30")
.filterMetadata("CLOUD_COVER", "less_than", 10)
// .select('B[2-8]')
.map(maskClouds)
.map(indices)
.mean();
print(l8)

// NDBI

var ndbi = l8.select('ndbi');
var ndbi = ndbi.gt(.1).and(ndbi.lt(.3));

var ndbiVis = {min:.1, max:.3, palette: ['white', 'red']}

// NDVI

var NDVIMask = l8.select('NDVI').gt(0.275);
var ndviVis = {min:.275, max:1, palette: ['black', 'green']}



//Select bands and parameters for visualization


var nat = {bands:['B4','B3','B2'], min:.05 , max: 0.275}; 
//Add layer to map

Map.addLayer(l8.clip(region), nat, 'natural ');
Map.addLayer(ndbi.clip(region), ndbiVis, 'After masking ndbi ');
Map.addLayer(NDVIMask.clip(region), ndviVis, 'After masking NDVi ');

// var type = ee.Geometry.type(Water);

        // lets start training/////////////////////////
var classes = Water.merge(Waste_land).merge(Built_Up).merge(Green_Cover);

var bands = ['B5','B6','B4','ndbi'];

var image = l8.select(bands);
//Assemble samples for the model
var samples = image.sampleRegions({
  collection: classes, // Set of geometries selected for training
  properties: ['lc'], // Label from each geometry
  scale: 30 
  }).randomColumn('random'); // creates a column with random numbers
  

var split = 0.8; // Roughly 80% for training, 20% for testing.
var training = samples.filter(ee.Filter.lt('random', split)); //Subset training data
var testing = samples.filter(ee.Filter.gte('random', split)); //Subset testing data

//Print these variables to see how much training and testing data you are using
  print('Samples n =', samples.aggregate_count('.all'));
  print('Training n =', training.aggregate_count('.all'));
  print('Testing n =', testing.aggregate_count('.all'));
  
  var classifier = ee.Classifier.smileRandomForest(5).train({ 
  features: training.select(['B5','B6','B4','ndbi','lc']), //Train using bands and landcover property
  classProperty: 'lc', //Pull the landcover property from classes
  inputProperties: bands
  });

  
print(classifier.explain())  ;

  var validation = testing.classify(classifier);
  var testAccuracy = validation.errorMatrix('lc', 'classification');
  print('Validation error matrix RF: ', testAccuracy);
  print('Validation overall accuracy RF: ', testAccuracy.accuracy());

var classed = image.select(bands) // select the predictors
                    .classify(classifier);
                    
// Add classification to map
Map.addLayer (classed.clip(region), {min: 0, max: 4,
palette:['lightgreen','blue','yellow','red','darkgreen']}, 'classified')


// Model Tuning......................

var numT = ee.List.sequence(3, 50, 2);

var acc = numT.map(function(x) {
var classifier = ee.Classifier.libsvm({ kernelType: 'RBF', gamma: 0.5, cost: 10 }).train({
  features: training.select(['B5', 'B6', 'B4', 'ndbi', 'lc']),
  classProperty: 'lc',
  inputProperties: bands
});

return testing
  .classify(classifier)
  .errorMatrix('lc', 'classification')
  .accuracy();
});

var chart = ui.Chart.array.values({
array: ee.Array(acc),
axis: 0,
xLabels: numT
})
;
print(chart)

// Colorize the classified image
var classedColorized = classed
  .visualize({min: 0, max: 4, palette: ['lightgreen', 'blue', 'yellow', 'red', 'darkgreen']});

// Add colorized classification to map
Map.addLayer(classedColorized.clip(region), {}, 'Colorized Classified Image');

Export.image.toDrive({
    image: classedColorized.clip(region),
    description: 'lulc_bengaluru_2016',
    scale: 30,
    region: region
  });

// Calculate areas for each class
var areas = classed.reduceRegions({
  collection: region,
  reducer: ee.Reducer.frequencyHistogram().unweighted(),
  scale: 30,
});

// Extract the histogram information
var histogram = ee.Dictionary(ee.List(areas.first().get('histogram')));

// Create a bar chart

var wavelength = [0.85, 1.57, 0.64];

var barChart = ui.Chart.image.regions(
  l8.select(['B5', 'B6', 'B4']), classes, ee.Reducer.mean(), 4, 'label', wavelength
  );

print(barChart);


histogram.keys().getInfo().forEach(function (key) {
  var classArea = ee.Number(histogram.get(key));
  var percentage = classArea.divide(ee.Number(areas.size())).multiply(100);
  
  // Convert to JavaScript number before using toFixed
  var classAreaValue = classArea.getInfo();
  var percentageValue = percentage.getInfo();

  print('Class: ' + key + ', Total Area: ' + classAreaValue.toFixed(2) + ' square meters, Percentage: ' + percentageValue.toFixed(2) + '%');
});

// Create a legend
var legend = ui.Panel({
  style: {
    position: 'bottom-left',
    padding: '8px 15px'
  }
});

// Define classes, colors, and labels
var classInfo = [
  { name: 'Water Body', color: 'blue' },
  { name: 'Waste Land', color: 'yellow' },
  { name: 'Built-Up', color: 'red' },
  { name: 'Green Areas', color: 'green' }
];

// Create and add labels to the legend for each class
classInfo.forEach(function (classItem) {
  var colorBox = ui.Label({
    style: {
      backgroundColor: classItem.color,
      padding: '8px',
      margin: '0 0 4px 0'
    }
  });

  var classLabel = ui.Label({
    value: 'Class ' + (classInfo.indexOf(classItem) + 1) + ': ' + classItem.name,
    style: { margin: '0 0 4px 6px' }
  });

  legend.add(colorBox);
  legend.add(classLabel);
});

// Add the legend to the map
Map.add(legend);
